[@microsoft/fast-element](./fast-element.md) &gt; [css](./fast-element.css.md)

## css() function

Transforms a template literal string into styles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function css(strings: TemplateStringsArray, ...values: (ComposableStyles | CSSDirective)[]): ElementStyles;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  strings | TemplateStringsArray | The string fragments that are interpolated with the values. |
|  values | ([ComposableStyles](./fast-element.composablestyles.md) \| [CSSDirective](./fast-element.cssdirective.md)<!-- -->)\[\] | The values that are interpolated with the string fragments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ElementStyles](./fast-element.elementstyles.md)

## Remarks

The css helper supports interpolation of strings and ElementStyle instances.
